items.sentence: Tom might\'ve borrowed the money he needed from someone else.
Tom speaks French well, but not as well as he speaks English.
Tom stared at Mary as if she was speaking a foreign language.
Tom thought that Mary would like to go to Boston to see John.
Tom drinks coffee to stay awake when he\'s studying at night.
Tom enjoyed looking at the paintings hanging on Mary\'s wall.
I hope I have an opportunity to meet Tom when I\'m in Boston.
Tom\'s hobbies are gardening, sailing, carpentry and cycling.
I hadn\'t planned to tell you about what happened last night.
I never thought it\'d be this easy to hack into your website.
